text: "(Something Inside) So Strong" is a 1987 song by Labi Siffre. It was taken from his album So Strong. It went to number 4 in the United Kingdom, number 2 in Ireland and number 3 in the Netherlands. It is based on the Apartheid in South Africa and homosexuality experienced when he was a child. It was covered by Kenny Rogers in 1989. Category:1987 songs Category:R&B; songs Category:LGBT songs Category:Kenny Rogers songs
title: (Something Inside) So Strong
